data.title: Weather in Zurich in march: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for March 2025! - Switzerland
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Zurich (in Switzerland) in march good? Discover the weather forecast in march 2025 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Zurich in march: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Zurich?

Weather in Zurich in march 2025

The weather in Zurich in the month of march comes from statistical datas on the last years. You can view the weather statistics for all the month, but also navigating through the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Zurich in march

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Zurich in march.

The climate of Zurich in march is very bad

The climate in march in Zurich is rather dry (with 70mm of rainfall over 5 days). It should be noted an improvement from the previous month since in february it receives an average of 79mm of precipitation over 5 days.

The climate is relatively cool in that locality the month of march, but it is liveable when dressing warm. Temperatures are up to 11°C. The seasonal minimum is 2°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of march in Zurich is 6°C. Note that these seasonal averages are in contrast with those observed in Zurich in march with a maximum record of 22°C in 2014 and a minimum record of -14°C in 2010. You need to prepare to have about 12 days with temperatures under 0°C, or 39% of the month.

On this month of march, day length in Zurich is generally 11:52. Sunrise is at 06:39 and sunset is at 18:31.

Weather data for Zurich in march:

Weather data for Zurich for march are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Zurich. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Zurich can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Zurich.
